00040 #include "tgc.h"
00041 #include "Point3D.h"
00042 #include "Vector3D.h"
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 
00045 Point3D::Point3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00046 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 Point3D::Point3D( const Vector3D& vector )
00051 : x(vector.x), y(vector.y), z(vector.z)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 Point3D::~Point3D( )
00056 {
00057 }
00058 
00059 Point3D& Point3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00060 {
00061     x += vector.x;
00062     y += vector.y;
00063     z += vector.z;
00064     return *this;
00065 }
00066 
00067 Point3D Point3D::operator+( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00068 {
00069         return Point3D( x + vector.x, y + vector.y, z + vector.z );
00070 }
00071 
00072 Point3D& Point3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00073 {
00074     x -= vector.x;
00075     y -= vector.y;
00076     z -= vector.z;
00077     return *this;
00078 }
00079 
00080 Point3D Point3D::operator-( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00081 {
00082         return Point3D( x - vector.x, y - vector.y, z - vector.z );
00083 }
00084 
00085 Point3D& Point3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00086 {
00087     x *= scalar;
00088     y *= scalar;
00089     z *= scalar;
00090     return *this;
00091 }
00092 
00093 Point3D Point3D::operator*( double scalar ) const
00094 {
00095         return Point3D( x * scalar, y * scalar, z * scalar );
00096 }
00097 
00098 Point3D& Point3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00099 {
00100     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00101     x *= inv;
00102     y *= inv;
00103     z *= inv;
00104     return *this;
00105 }
00106 
00107 Point3D Point3D::operator/( double scalar ) const
00108 {
00109     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00110     return Point3D( inv * x, inv * y, inv * z );
00111 }
00112 
00113 Vector3D Point3D::operator-( const Point3D& point ) const
00114 {
00115         return Vector3D( x - point.x, y - point.y, z - point.z );
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 bool Point3D::operator==( const Point3D& point ) const
00120 {
00121         if( this == &point ) return true;
00122     else return ( !( fabs(x - point.x) > tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00123                                   !( fabs(y - point.y) > tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00124                                   !( fabs(z - point.z) > tgc::Epsilon ) );
00125 }
00126 
00127 bool Point3D::operator!=( const Point3D& point ) const
00128 {
00129         if( this == &point ) return false;
00130     else return ( ( fabs(x - point.x) > tgc::Epsilon ) ||
00131                                   ( fabs(y - point.y) > tgc::Epsilon ) ||
00132                                   ( fabs(z - point.z) > tgc::Epsilon ) );
00133 }
00134 
00135 double Point3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00136 {
00137     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00138     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00139     return z;
00140 }
00141 
00142 double& Point3D::operator[]( int i )
00143 {
00144     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00145     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00146     return z;
00147 }
00148 
00149 Point3D operator*( double scalar, const Point3D& point )
00150 {
00151         return point * scalar;
00152 }
00153 
00154 std::ostream &operator<<( std::ostream &os, const Point3D& pA )
00155 {
00156     os << pA.x << ", " << pA.y << ", " << pA.z;
00157     return os;
00158 }
00159 
00160 double Distance( const Point3D& pointA, const Point3D& pointB )
00161 {
00162         return (pointA - pointB).length();
00163 }
00164 
00165 double DistanceSquared( const Point3D& pointA, const Point3D& pointB )
00166 {
00167     return ( pointA - pointB ).lengthSquared();
00168 }
